Class SldAbandonedShip

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.advCards.sealed.SldAdvCard
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.advCards.sealed.SldAbandonedShip
public final class SldAbandonedShip extends SldAdvCard
Represents the sealed advanced card "Abandoned Ship", a special event card that affects players by potentially costing crew members in exchange for credits and movement penalties.

This card may be played by players who have enough crew, allowing them to remove guests (crew), lose a number of days, and gain credits. It tracks whether the effect has been applied to prevent repeated application.

    • SldAbandonedShip

      public SldAbandonedShip(int id, int level, int daysLost, int credits, int crewLost)
      Constructs a new Abandoned Ship card with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique card ID
      level - the card's difficulty level
      daysLost - the number of days lost when the effect is applied
      credits - the amount of credits gained when the effect is applied
      crewLost - the number of crew members required to activate the card

    • loadAbandonedShip

      public static SldAbandonedShip loadAbandonedShip(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
      Loads an SldAbandonedShip object from a JSON node. This static method parses the provided JsonNode to extract the necessary attributes (id, level, daysLost, credits, and crewLost) and constructs a new SldAbandonedShip instance.
      Parameters:
      node - The JsonNode containing the data for the abandoned ship.
      Returns:
      A new SldAbandonedShip instance populated with data from the JSON node.

    • init

      public void init(GameServer game)
      Initializes the card with game context, filtering which players may interact with it.

      Only players with enough crew are considered eligible to activate the card.

      Specified by:
      init in class SldAdvCard
      Parameters:
      game - the game instance

    • applyEffect

      public void applyEffect(String nickname, boolean wantsToActivate, List<Cordinate> housingCordinatesList)
      Applies the card's effect to the current player, if they choose to activate it.

      The player will lose crew, gain credits, and lose days. Events are generated for each removed crew component. This method can only be called once per player.

      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player attempting activation
      wantsToActivate - true if the player agrees to apply the effect
      housingCordinatesList - the coordinates of the crew components to be removed
      Throws:
      IncorrectFlyBoardException - if activation conditions are not met
      BadPlayerException - if an unauthorized player attempts to apply the effect

    • setNextPlayer

      public void setNextPlayer()
      Advances to the next player, if any, or finalizes the card state if the effect has been applied.

      setNextPlayer in class SldAdvCard
